description:
Karl has a "Top Ten List" of the guys he likes best on Sean Cody.
"I like what I like," he said with a big smile. "I'm a hungry person!"
Karl put Paul at number 3 on his list. I'm not sure yet who numbers 1 and 2 are, but I don't think it really mattered once Karl met Paul.
"He's hot!" Karl said. "And he's so nice, too. I love that!"
Paul seemed really happy as well. He really likes an enthusiastic partner and Karl is definitely that.
Now, Karl told us previously that he likes to get fucked deep. And he means DEEP. So he was really excited when he saw Paul's cock at full mast.
"It's nice and long," he said. "It's going to hit in all the right places!"
title: Paul & Karl
